block.p: Before, my self-portraits engaged in a certain level of masquerade and more ambiguity. In a way, I'm more stripped bare in this portrait. My own sense of anger and passion is really revealed. But it's not strictly autobiographical. It also reveals a certain sense of the Passion and a heightened sense of anxiety around desire, death and mortality. I'm interested in those layerings.
